hero.name: I'm Faizan Ali
hero.description: Motivated Full Stack Web Developer with hands-on experience building responsive, modern, and scalable web applications.

right.caption: ABOUT ME
right.description: I’m a motivated and adaptable Full Stack Web Developer with practical experience in building responsive interfaces and contributing to backend development. I focus on clean code, performance, and delivering high-quality solutions in fast-paced environments.

card1.title: Clean Code
card1.description: Writing maintainable, scalable, and well-structured code for real-world applications.

card2.title: Team Collaboration
card2.description: Working closely with designers and developers to ensure UI/UX consistency.

service.caption: WHAT I DO
service.description: I design and develop responsive websites and web applications using modern technologies, focusing on performance, usability, and scalability.

left.title: Frontend Development
left.description: Building responsive and pixel-perfect UIs using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and Tailwind.

left.title: Backend Development
left.description: Developing backend features using JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL with clean architecture.

left.title: Figma to Code
left.description: Converting Figma designs into SEO-optimized, high-performance web pages.

portfolio.caption: PROJECTS
portfolio.title: Real-World Applications I’ve Built
portfolio.description: A selection of projects showcasing my skills in frontend, backend, and full stack development.

eduandexp.caption: EDUCATION & EXPERIENCE
eduandexp.title: Learning, Building & Growing
eduandexp.description: A journey of continuous learning through academic studies and hands-on development experience.

experience.caption: EXPERIENCE
experience.title: Web Developer
experience.description: Developed responsive websites and dashboards using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Bootstrap, and Tailwind. Converted Figma designs into pixel-perfect UI and collaborated with teams to deliver high-quality solutions.

contactpage.title: Contact Me
contactpage.description: Have a project or opportunity in mind? Feel free to reach out — I’d love to connect.
